title: conferences area: lightning talks
body_html: In the conferences area, it would be useful to have a field that shows whether the conference allows/has lightning talk slots or not (a checkbox would be enough) – this would cut down on work when emailing the students selected for the conferences and having to look up manually if the conferences offer lightning talk slots.
